114.content: Another thing, what gender are you?
114.title: Eevee

choices: Rocket lab, about to be transformed
1141.content: Now that that's out of the way, where are you?
1141.title: But where?

11411.content:
"How did I end up here", I thought to myself. Oh. I'm Greg by the way, from Mahogany Town. I was just walking to the shop one day, and next thing I knew, I was here, in rocket's lab.

Just then, the door of my cell opened, and a guy in black walked in.
"You, come with me", he ordered.
"Why", I asked.
"Experiment", he said. He dragged me into another room, and behind my back, injected me with something. That's when I passed out.

When I awoke, a woman was standing before me.
"Ahh, the experiment was a complete success", she muttered to herself.
Experiment?
I saw my reflection on the steel walls, an Eevee morph. Big ears, bushy tail through your trousers, paws(bastards, they took my shoes).
I had to get out of here, so I punched the woman in the face, and ran, paws skating on the marble floor.

I heard voices crying for help, but I might get caught again. So I
11411.title: How it all happened

choices: Follow Johnny to his friends house
Follow Isaac on his date with Christene
115.content: You wake up one morning and strech your stubby arms, and yawn. You roll yourself out of bed and look for some clothes to put on. There is a knock on the door. Your annoying Munchlax brother. He comes flying in the room while your put on your pants and T-shirt. "Hey Isaac, what we gonna do today huh huh huh, we should go to that all you can eat resturant, what ya say huh huh huh? Come one come on, we should go somewhere, its so BORING here. None of my friends come over anymore. Take me with you, pleeeaaase." He says in his most annoyingly cute sort of way. "No, Johnny, and thats that, I got a date with Christene today and all you'd do is spoil it." You said as you put on some watch and class ring. "NOO, I promise I'll be good. PLEEEEASEE!!" he said as he fell on his knees and started to beg you, you look over to him and just shake your head. "I won't take you with me but why don't you call over to one of your friends houses and see if its alright if you come over k. Now get out of my room!" You say and slam the door behind you.
115.title: Snorlax guy.  Anoying Munchlax bro

choices: They stop at a McDonalds on the way
They come to Tims house directly'
1152.content: You finish getting ready, grab the keys to your maximum sized car. You walk out of the door. "Hey hey hey hey, you said you'd drop me off at my freinds house. Come on you promised!!! Momma says you have to drop me off at Tims house!" Johnny said, he is so freakin spastic. You can't wait 'till he evolves and calms down a little bit. "I never said that I wouldn't drop you off, In fact I told you I'd drop you off. You just need to calm down a little bit. I'll drop you off at Tim's I promise just as long as you don't spaz out again, ok." You say to your little brother who is currently bouncing on the balls of his feet. You start to walk to you the door. "Hey, wait for me, you said you'd drop me off at Tims house!" he says, I guess he thought I was trying to leave him....not a bad idea, but my mom would have a fit when I got back. "I'm just goin to the car, the only thing that would make you get left is if you didn't get into the car before I left. Come one and just get in the car!" "OK!!!" he said and blew past me and a moment later he was in the car and was blowing the horn for me to hurry up. He's a little bit spastic as I think I have told you before...
1152.title: Just about ready to go.

11522.content:
You pull up and stop in front of Tim's house. Tim is waiting on the front porch for your little brother. He was about Johnny's age, 11, and he was a Pikachu-morph.

Tim's older brother comes out of the door, "Hey Isaac, whats happening?" Says Robert, a Raichu-morph. "Not much, got a date with Christene today though. You?" You ask as he starts to come down to your car. "Pretty much the same as always. I'm actually getting ready to go on a date with Katie, We both have really hot girls don't we?" He added with a bit of a dreamy expression on his face. "I'd say that's true, cause Christene sure is foxy, if you'll excuse the pun" You say with a bit of a laugh.

You always enjoyed the pun as Christene was a Ninetails-morph. "Well, my girl Katie is one cute cat, if you don't mind me making a pun of my own!" He said, his girlfriend was a Persion-Morph. "Hey, d'you mind if I ride with you. I'm going to the mall with her today, so I guess I could save a little gas and get away from the little motor mouths!" He said with a grin, "No I don't mind, climb in!" you say and then you set off.

then what
11522.title: Bro dropped off, Off to the Mall

choices: a forest outside of Goldenrod city
in a team rocket lab somewhere
121.content:
So your a male Umbreon pokemorph.

and you live in one of the following areas .
121.title: where do you live

choices: Open them and free the inhabitants
1212.content: 'Get me out!!!' I screamed but the men in white coats just ignored me. I wouldn't let them take me without a fight. One of the female people in white coats opened that cage. Thank you. She picked me up and took me over to the man with needles... I got angry. Really angry. I squirmed but she kept a tight grip on me. Then everything went black. She let go of me so I jumped down and ran. I passed everyone, they didn't even notice I had gone. Other cages with squirms echoed my ears. What do I do?
1212.title: Nightshade

choices: Wait, no, I changed my mind! I want to be something else.
131.content: Are you a boy or a girl?
131.title: Kirlia

choices: I think I should start at a different part of the story or in a different P.O.V.
1311.content: Well then, are we ready to start the story?
1311.title: Boy

13111.content:
You are a male Kirlia pokemorph. You are trapped in team Rocket's base, and are planning an escape with your two friends; A female Charmander pokemorph named Charlene and a male Piplup pokemorph named Paul. Not that those are your real names, of course, but your memories were wiped when you were transformed.

"So does everyone understand the plan?" Charlene asked. You and Paul nodded. "Good. You know what to do."
13111.title: Let's go!

1312.content: You are a huminoid female Kirlia. So, what will you do?
1312.title: Girl

134.content: Want to be a Rayquaza pokemorph?
134.title: Rayquaza?

info.description:
okay, basicaly you are a pokemorph, you escaped from team rocket's lab, and you meet other pokemorphs.
(FYI a pokemorph is a half pokemon half human if you're new to this sort of thing)
